rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall designed with wide doorways and ramps for wheelchair accessibility, integrated with a secure entry system.
Open living area with modern decor, ample natural lighting from large windows aligned for Vastu principles.
Modern kitchen equipped with contemporary appliances and an accessible layout. Designed following Vastu guidelines by positioning in the North-West.
Private bedroom designed for comfort and privacy with easy access to amenities, compliant with Vastu by aligning in the South-West.
Accessible bathroom with safety features, non-slip surfaces, and adequate space as per local building norms.
Compact storage closet integrated into the bedroom or living area, following local norms for additional space.

openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible main entrance with a ramp leading from the garden.
Secondary door providing direct access to the large garden area for recreational purposes and ventilation.
Dedicated entry to the private gym located within the ground floor, ensuring seamless transition from living area.

special_areas.description: Private gym area integrated into the ground floor with necessary workout equipment, proper ventilation and soundproofing. Designed to be wheelchair accessible.
Expansive garden area adjoining the house, offering a serene outdoor space for relaxation and activities, with pathways that are wheelchair accessible.

additional_features.description: All areas designed to be wheelchair friendly with ramps, wider doorways, lower counter heights, and non-slip surfaces.
Each room aligned according to Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow and balanced design elements.
